__e: And the bad in you might just be greedy enough to take it.
Blinded by greed, that's what you want to see.
Well, greed and illness have been so prevalent in my family, it's difficult to know where one ends and the other begins.
Only thing stronger than the craving for blood is your love for this girl.
The only thing stronger than your craving for blood is your love for this one girl.
Some people are blinded by the thirst for money and it makes them lose their values and go crazy and do things they shouldn't do.
Greed is human nature, and desire for knowledge drives us.
Already 6 weeks and the greed is still there.
Someone reminded me the other evening that I once said, "Greed is good. "
